fields.receiveMentionEmailNotifications: Email notifications about mentions in posts
fields.receiveStreamEmailNotifications: Email notifications about posts and status updates
fields.emailReplyToAllByDefault: Email Reply to all by default
fields.doNotFillAssignedUserIfNotRequired: Do not pre-fill assigned user on record creation
fields.followEntityOnStreamPost: Auto-follow record after posting in Stream
fields.followCreatedEntityTypeList: Auto-follow created records of specific entity types

tooltips.autoFollowEntityTypeList: Automatically follow ALL new records (created by any user) of the selected entity types. To be able to see information in the stream and receive notifications about all records in the system.
tooltips.doNotFillAssignedUserIfNotRequired: When create record assigned user won't be filled with own user unless the field is required.
tooltips.followCreatedEntities: When create new records, they will be automatically followed even if assigned to another user.
tooltips.followCreatedEntityTypeList: When create new records of selected entity types, they will be followed automatically even if assigned to another user.
